title: New York Yankees - Font
content:
Anyone know what fonts is used for the NY Yankees shown here?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [yankees.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027074019/http:/typophile.com/files/yankees.jpg) | 32.68 KB |
author: busogmeansfull

comments.content: Defenitly a customised copperplate script, (not copperplate from F.W. Goudy). You could check scripts like — Edwardian Script, Shelly Script, English Script. Linotype.com \> Scriptfonts. The s is way of compared to regular copperplate script, so I think you won't find it as a typeface unless someone has made one from it.
